p: We are currently recruiting for an autonomous driving startup in San Francisco who are looking for a software engineer to join their team. Joining as the first dedicated software engineer, you will be working primarily in C++ and Python, and will have ideally worked in ROS before.
p.2: This role would suit an engineer with a start-up mentality, who wants to join an early-stage business (sub 10 heads) and play a massive role in the companies future. They are developing an autonomous driving product, and have already secured a number of large orders.
p.4: The salary for this role is in the region of $230k - $250k + equity, and this role can be done entirely remotely, although you will need to visit the office in San Francisco occasionally.
p.14: + Experience with autonomous vehicle / robot technology
p.16: + Experience developing safety critical software would be beneficial
p.18: Please send in an up to date resume to apply!
